egs.eg: She asked him to leave, but he refused.
egs.egTranslation: 她叫他走，但他不肯。

egs.eg: When he offered all that money, I could hardly refuse (= could not refuse ) , could I?
egs.egTranslation: 他愿意给那么多钱，我怎么可能拒绝呢？

translations: adj. 可溶的；可以解决的

egs.eg: soluble aspirin
egs.egTranslation: 可溶性阿司匹林

egs.eg: brave soldiers
egs.egTranslation: 勇敢的士兵

egs.eg: her brave fight against cancer
egs.egTranslation: 她与癌症的勇敢搏斗

egs.eg: Despite their captain’s brave performance, Arsenal lost 2–1.
egs.egTranslation: 尽管队长表现出色，但阿森纳队还是以1比2告负。

translations: n. 帽子（一般指有边的）

egs.eg: Maria was wearing a beautiful new hat.
egs.egTranslation: 玛丽亚戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子。

egs.eg: a sandy beach
egs.egTranslation: 沙滩

egs.eg: surfers on the beach
egs.egTranslation: 沙滩上的冲浪者

egs.eg: an agreement between the US and Colombian authorities
egs.egTranslation: 美国和哥伦比亚当局的一份协议

egs.eg: Only the president has the authority to declare war.
egs.egTranslation: 只有总统才有权宣战。

egs.eg: I need to speak to someone in authority (= who has a position of power ) .
egs.egTranslation: 我得找管事的人谈谈。

egs.eg: Are you going to roast the chicken?
egs.egTranslation: 这鸡你是准备烤的吗？

egs.eg: the delicious smell of meat roasting
egs.egTranslation: 烤肉的香味

egs.eg: We caught a rabbit and roasted it over an open fire.
egs.egTranslation: 我们捉到一只兔子，放在火上烧烤。

egs.eg: dry-roasted peanuts
egs.egTranslation: 干烘的花生

egs.eg: an amplified guitar
egs.egTranslation: 带有扩音设备的电吉他

egs.eg: These stories only amplified her fears.
egs.egTranslation: 这些故事徒增了她的恐惧感。

egs.eg: The bulk of consumers are based in towns.
egs.egTranslation: 大多数消费者都是城镇居民。

egs.eg: The dough will rise until it is double in bulk.
egs.egTranslation: 面团会发酵到原来的两倍大。

egs.eg: He put the coffee on the table.
egs.egTranslation: 他把咖啡放在桌上。

egs.eg: Where did you put the programmes?
egs.egTranslation: 你把节目单放在哪里了？

egs.eg: A wide base will make the structure much more stable.
egs.egTranslation: 宽大的底座会使结构牢固许多。

egs.eg: Children like a stable environment.
egs.egTranslation: 儿童喜欢稳定的环境。

translations: n. 证书，证件，执照；（毕业）文凭，合格证书

egs.eg: birth/death/marriage certificate (=giving details of someone’s birth, death, or marriage)
egs.egTranslation: 出生/死亡/结婚证书

egs.eg: a degree certificate
egs.egTranslation: 学位证书

egs.eg: She worked a dragon on the new linen cloth.
egs.egTranslation: 她在新的亚麻布上绣了条龙。

translations: adj. 有能力的；有才能的

egs.eg: I don’t think he’s capable of murder.
egs.egTranslation: 我认为他没有能力杀人。

egs.eg: The company isn’t capable of handling an order that large.
egs.egTranslation: 那家公司没有能力应付那么大的订单。

egs.eg: I’m perfectly capable of looking after myself, thank you!
egs.egTranslation: 我完全能够自己照顾自己，多谢了！

egs.eg: a strong capable woman
egs.egTranslation: 一个坚强能干的女人

egs.eg: Despite strong criticism , the new system is still in place.
egs.egTranslation: 尽管遭到了猛烈的批评，新制度依然原封不动。

egs.eg: There has been widespread criticism of the decision.
egs.egTranslation: 这一决定受到了普遍的批评。

egs.eg: We try to give students constructive criticism .
egs.egTranslation: 我们设法对学生提出有建设性的批评。

egs.eg: Another criticism levelled at him was that his teaching methods were old-fashioned.
egs.egTranslation: 还有一个针对他的批评是，他的教学方法已经过时。

egs.eg: The government’s economic strategy has attracted a lot of criticism .
egs.egTranslation: 政府的经济政策招致了大量的批评。

egs.eg: You must learn to accept criticism .
egs.egTranslation: 你必须学会接受批评。

egs.eg: Many employees find it hard to take even mild criticism .
egs.egTranslation: 有许多员工甚至连轻微的批评也很难接受。

egs.eg: His actions provoked severe criticism from civil rights groups.
egs.egTranslation: 他的行为招致了民权组织的严厉批评。

egs.eg: the storm of criticism that followed his announcement
egs.egTranslation: 他的声明引来的批评浪潮

egs.eg: literary criticism
egs.egTranslation: 文学评论
